mapper.insert: insert into reservation_contents(movie_title,movie_place, movie_time, movie_Seat, username, reservation_price, paymentId) values (#{movieTitle}, #{moviePlace}, #{movieTime},#{movieSeat}, #{username}, #{reservation_price}, #{paymentId});
mapper.select: select * from movie_category_table where movie_category_lv = 2 and group_id="A";
mapper.insert: insert into movie_payment (username, movie_title, movie_time, movie_place, paymentId, reservation_price, movie_Seat, payment_time) values (#{username}, #{movie_title}, #{movie_time}, #{movie_place}, #{paymentId}, #{reservation_price}, #{movie_Seat}, now())
mapper.select: select * from reservation_contents where username=#{username} and paymentId=#{paymentId};
mapper.insert: insert into paymentIdvo(paymentId,reservation_price, username, payment_time) values(#{paymentId}, #{reservation_price}, #{username}, #{payment_time})

insert into movie_payment_paymentId(paymentId, movie_title, movie_time, movie_place, movie_Seat, reservation_price, payment_time, username) values (#{paymentId}, #{movie_title}, #{movie_time},#{movie_place}, #{movie_Seat}, #{reservation_price}, #{payment_time}, #{username})
mapper.select: select b.paymentId, a.movie_title, a.movie_time, a.movie_place,a.movie_Seat, a.reservation_price, b.payment_time, a.username from movie_payment_paymentId as a left join paymentIdvo as b on a.paymentId = b.paymentId
